name: Pickleball Playgroups
description: Features: - Louis Sutter Pickleball Complex is an excellent facility with 6 outdoor dedicated Pickleball courts next to the basketball court below the pond. - There are lots of parking spaces around the park, and the primary entrance driveway is at the corner of University and Woolsey Sts. - No fee and open to the public. - Must bring your own paddles and balls. - Water fountain and restrooms are available For Playgroup arrangements use Online App

howToGetIt: For Playgroup arrangements and reservations use Online App
